snippet.title: Debra Gordon, Medical Journalist
snippet.description: ... Debra Gordon is an award-winning journalist who has been writing about health and healthcare for more than 15 years. She cut her teeth on the medical beat while a reporter at the Virginian Pilot newspaper in Norfolk, Va., then carried her expertise across the country as the medical reporter at the Orange County Register, in Southern California. She has been a full-time freelance health and medical writer and editor since 2000, and has authored or co-authored numerous consumer health books, including Cut Your Cholesterol!, Asthma and Allergy Relief, Eat to Beat High Blood Pressure, 7 Nights to a Perfect Night’s Sleep, Maximum Food Power for Women, and Stealth Health. Her first Idiot’s Guide book, The Complete Idiot’s Guide to Type 2 Diabetes, will be published in the fall. I was happy to try it but skeptical about how well it might work.
